title: "Understanding the Importance of Polarity in Health and Magnetism"

last_phrase: In conclusion, magnetizing water involves holding your hand above the water and making strokes over it in a specific manner. It's essential to focus your thoughts on transmitting an invisible force from your hands and fingers to the water. Further, use positive affirmations and visualize growth while doing this. Adding some breath into the process could also amplify its effects. Regular practice of this process will yield better results in the long run.
